meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>cage</radical> with an <radical>axe</radical> in it above your house to show that you are an <kanji>artisan</kanji>. All of the artisans have to have this special sign somewhere near where they live to show they make things.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Artisan</kanji>s have to be marked this way because the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) says so. The Shougun doesn't want to have to put any effort into finding people to make things for him, so he created this new system.
